objects.text:
• Classic Retro Design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Fast Autofocus System
• Compact & Lightweight Body

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Premium Mirrorless Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro design with modern digital capabilities
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with real-time preview
• Versatile 3-inch tilting LCD screen for creative angles
• Fast autofocus system for precise shooting
• Built-in Wi-Fi for instant photo sharing
• Compatible with high-quality Fujinon X-mount lenses
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel
• Multiple manual control dials for professional handling
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Rich tone reproduction and superior low-light performance
• Durable metal construction with ergonomic grip

banner_details:
This banner features a modern tech advertisement design, targeted toward camera enthusiasts. The layout consists of a dark grid-patterned background with intersecting square zones and low-opacity graphical accents like lines, triangles, circles, and curved paths. A high-quality image of a camera dominates the right side ("product_image"), adding dynamic interest and realism.

On the left, the heading ("brand_name") stands out in a bold, futuristic font paired with the product model ("product_model") in a vibrant blue shade. Beneath that, a minimal tagline ("tagline") reinforces the premium positioning. A feature list ("features") appears aligned vertically in a clean sans-serif font. Toward the bottom, bold pricing ("price") and a call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta_text") create a clear sales funnel.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal: #222831 (background)
- Deep Gray: #393E46
- Teal: #00ADB5 (highlight elements)
- Soft White: #EEEEEE (text and accents)

The structured grid, strong visual hierarchy, and sleek design make this banner visually compelling and product-focused.
product_color: The product image features the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, showcasing a sleek and professional color palette dominated by matte black (#1A1A1A) with refined highlights of metallic silver (#D9D9D9) and white (#FFFFFF) used for text and detailing. Accents of red (#FF3333) and orange (#FF9900) on the lens add visual contrast and focus. The blend of these colors enhances the premium and functional aesthetic, with the high-gloss black on the lens subtly reflecting light to emphasize quality optics. These tones work harmoniously, making the image visually strong yet refined—ideal for a banner needing a modern, tech-savvy, yet understated color scheme.
